body:
I believe Pete meant, add a comment in the file that explains how to use it. I understand you have it in the readme, but having it in the file is much more likely to be found.

Also, I do believe your description in the readme is incorrect -- this file will not be installed with the pip package as it is today, I believe. @petewarden I may be wrong about that though.
body_html:
I believe Pete meant, add a comment in the file that explains how to use it. I understand you have it in the readme, but having it in the file is much more likely to be found.

Also, I do believe your description in the readme is incorrect -- this file will not be installed with the pip package as it is today, I believe. @petewarden I may be wrong about that though.
body_text:
I believe Pete meant, add a comment in the file that explains how to use it. I understand you have it in the readme, but having it in the file is much more likely to be found.
Also, I do believe your description in the readme is incorrect -- this file will not be installed with the pip package as it is today, I believe. @petewarden I may be wrong about that though.
